content.query:
-- Read Taxi_Zone.csv
-- Connect to Built in Serverless SQL Pool
-- Connect to nyc_taxi_discovery Database

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- abfss protocol
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]



-- Examine the Data Types
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'

-- Find the Max Length of each column
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID))  as len_LocationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough))  as len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone))  as len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone))  as len_service_zone

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


-- Use WITH Clause to Specify DataTypes . Field Names are Case Sensitive by default

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT ,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) ,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 
    )AS [result]


-- Now Check the Data Types Again

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    )
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT ,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) ,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 
    )AS [result]'

--

select name,collation_name from sys.databases



-- Specify the Collation

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15)   COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(50)   COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)   COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]


-- Change Database COLLATION

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery

USE nyc_taxi_discovery

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8

-- No Wanring of Collation as the Collation is set in nyc-taxi-discovery and we are running below query under this database 

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15)   ,
    Zone VARCHAR(50)   ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)  
    )AS [result]

-- Select only subset of columns

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    Borough VARCHAR(15)   ,
    Zone VARCHAR(50)   
    )AS [result]

-- Read a file without a header

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15)   ,
    Zone VARCHAR(50)   ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)  
    )AS [result]

-- Specify Ordinal Position
 SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    Borough VARCHAR(15)   2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50)  3 
    )AS [result]   

-- You can place the Column Name in any order as it will read thru Ordinal Position
 SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
    Zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
    Borough VARCHAR(15)   2
    
    )AS [result]   

-- Fix Column Names .  Ignore Header Specify the First Row in the File

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2 ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (loation_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15)  2 ,
    zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4  
    )AS [result]


-- Create External Data Source . EDS can only be created in User Defind Databases.

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/'    
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH ( 
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@azuresynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'    
)

  -- List All the External Data Sources

  SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources 

--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data

-- Use the EDS to load the CSV

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2 ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (loation_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15)  2 ,
    zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4  
    )AS [result]

-- use raw EDS 
 
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2 ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (loation_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15)  2 ,
    zone VARCHAR(50)  3 ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4  
    )AS [result]
